cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Whether you need a new website, a headless CMS migration, or help scaling your frontend team, I am here to help. Let's discuss your project.

faq.question: What is your availability?
faq.answer: I am available for full-time W2 positions and select contract projects. My schedule typically allows me to start new engagements within 2-4 weeks, depending on the scope.

faq.question: Do you work remotely?
faq.answer: Yes, I work remotely and have done so for over 8 years. I am based in Miami, FL and available for US-based remote positions. I am comfortable with async communication and can overlap with most US time zones.

faq.question: What is your hourly rate or salary expectations?
faq.answer: Rates depend on the project scope, timeline, and engagement type. For contract work, I provide fixed-price quotes after understanding your requirements. For W2 positions, I am happy to discuss compensation that aligns with senior-level market rates.

faq.question: Can you work with my existing team?
faq.answer: Absolutely. I have extensive experience integrating with existing development teams, following established workflows, and contributing to code reviews. Clear communication and documentation are priorities for me.

faq.question: What is your typical project process?
faq.answer: I start with a discovery call to understand your goals and requirements. From there, I provide a proposal with timeline and deliverables. During development, I maintain regular communication through your preferred channels and provide demos at key milestones.

meta.title: Hire a Jamstack Developer | Aaron Molina - Astro, Next.js, Sanity
meta.description: Looking to hire a Jamstack developer? I'm a senior frontend developer with 12+ years experience building high-performance sites with Astro, Next.js, and Sanity. Available for W2 or contract. Remote US / Miami.

hero.headline: Hire a Jamstack Developer
hero.description: I build high-performance, content-driven websites that load fast, rank well, and make content teams happy. With {yearsOfExperience}+ years of experience shipping production code, I can help you build or scale your web presence.

items.description: Improve Core Web Vitals and page speed scores. I audit, optimize, and rebuild sites to meet Google's performance standards and improve user experience.

items.title: Frontend Architecture
items.description: Component libraries, design systems, and frontend infrastructure. Clean, typed code that your team can maintain and extend for years to come.

items.title: Senior-Level Experience
items.description: Over a decade of shipping production code for startups, agencies, and enterprise clients including Corsair, the LA Clippers, and Azamara Cruises.

items.title: Team Player
items.description: I integrate smoothly with existing teams. Clear communication, thorough documentation, and collaborative code reviews are my standard practice.

items.title: Quality Focus
items.description: TypeScript, testing, accessibility, and performance are not afterthoughts. I build with best practices from day one to reduce technical debt.

items.title: Reliable Delivery
items.description: Clear timelines, regular updates, and no surprises. I scope accurately and communicate proactively when circumstances change.

items.title: React Application Development
items.description: Custom React applications built with modern best practices. Server components, hooks, context, and state management patterns that scale.

items.title: Next.js Development

items.description: React performance audits and optimization. Bundle analysis, code splitting, lazy loading, and rendering optimization.

items.description: Building with React since 2016. I understand the ecosystem deeply, from class components to hooks to server components.

items.title: TypeScript First
items.description: All my React code is fully typed with TypeScript. Better developer experience, fewer bugs, and easier maintenance.

items.title: Accessible by Default
items.description: I build with accessibility in mind from the start. WCAG compliance, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support.

services.subtitle: Content platforms that scale with your business

items.description: Full headless CMS setup with Sanity, Contentful, Strapi, or your platform of choice. Schema design, content modeling, and editor experience optimization.

items.description: Migrate from WordPress, Drupal, or legacy systems to modern headless architecture. Content mapping, data migration, and redirect strategies.

items.title: Sanity Certified
items.description: Deep expertise in Sanity CMS including GROQ, custom schemas, plugins, and the Content Lake API. I can build complex content models that stay maintainable.

items.description: I design CMS experiences with editors in mind. Intuitive interfaces, helpful validation, and workflows that reduce friction.

items.description: Structure content for web, mobile, and beyond. Portable text, image pipelines, and APIs that serve any frontend.

items.description: Build content systems that can evolve. I plan for schema migrations, content versioning, and platform independence.
